greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = lcm(phi(n), phi(n+1)).
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
program: (PARI) { for (n=1, 1000, write("b066813.txt", n, " ", lcm(eulerphi(n), eulerphi(n+1))) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Mar 29 2010
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Jan 20 2002
